ext_description.message: Automatically blocks all pages from any website that is not in your list of allowed websites.

msg_blocked_page_label.message: Whitelist Manager has prevented the following page from loading:

msg_blocked_instructions_label.message: If you wish to view pages from $HOSTNAME$, please add it to your list of allowed websites.

msg_about_dialog_haiku_label.message:
Summer here again.
Music plays sweetly, drifting.
And life is renewed.

msg_options_instructions_label.message: In order to use this extension, activate the blocking options you need below, and edit your list of safe websites. This extension will automatically block access to any website that is not in that list.

msg_options_block_pages_label.message: Block pages from websites not in my list

msg_options_block_others_label.message: Block other resources (images, scripts, etc.) from websites not in my list

msg_options_analytics_label.message: Send anonymized usage statistics and crash reports
